attributes.action: Allow Tul Bahadur Pun (VC) to live in Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
He has been refused entry to Britain, despite being awarded the Victoria Cross for his bravery while serving Britain in WW2. This is appauling, especially considering the number of people that we allow into the country each year who have not contributed anywhere near as much as this man.


http://www.dailymail.co.uk/pages/live/articles/news/worldnews.html?in_article_id=457426&in_page_id=1811

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
